resources.string: Topic 8: Sexual and Gender Based Violence
Topic 9: Kenya Essential Package for Health
Our Vision: Every African has access to excellent community health provision.

Our Mission: Deliver an integrated mobile learning and community health services platform to empower, train, and motivate Community Health Volunteers (CHVs), driven by a cross-sector partnership of leading organizations dedicated to improving health on the continent. To drive lasting health productivity and economic improvements for all communities by increasing access to quality, timely and appropriate healthcare.
Disclaimer: This is not the actual HELP application, but rather it demonstrates how a learner would interact with HELP on a basic mobile phone.

The HELP partnership is a cross-sector partnership of Amref Health Africa, Safaricom, Mezzanine, M-Pesa Foundation, and Accenture Development Partnerships bringing together the best in community health, mobility, technology, and the creation of lasting changes in the African primary healthcare landscape by working together to deliver a fully integrated mobile community health platform.
Help has defined a one-of-a-kind mobile learning approach, based on learning best-practices.
Right pace, rhythm and tools for mLearning.
Two way communication and support for Long Lasting Professional Development.
The optimal HELP mLearning solution is a balanced act between Pedagogy, Content, and Technology.
The platform provides a number of powerful features including:

Structured Learning- the “mPedagogy” applies advanced learning principles and approaches to basic mobile channels in a combination of “patterns” that aim to simulate the learning experience and outcomes from traditional in-person training methods, such as through role plays, job aids, quizzes and games, etc.
Collaboration - allowing community units to share knowledge, provide one another with support and communicate directly with supervisors.

Monitoring - weekly reports on CHV performance are sent directly to CHVs and their supervisors, and progress statistics are available to the HELP team. CHVs who are struggling can be contacted by the HELP team to provide encouragement and support.
Support - CHVs also have access to a dedicated, toll free help desk that can help them with any challenges.
